messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] Hello I'm Back!
messages.msgSnippet: Most of them are still around. I know of Kondou, Hijikata, Nagakura, and Saitou s descendants...the ones I know by name are Fujita Makoto (Saitou s descendant)
messages.messageBody:
Most of them are still around. I know of Kondou, Hijikata, Nagakura, and
Saitou's descendants...the ones I know by name are Fujita Makoto (Saitou's
descendant) and Miyagawa Toyoji (Kondou's descendant by way of his
nephew/adopted son Yuugorou).


Hmmm... aren't the present-day Hijikatas descended from Kiroku rather than Toshizou? I did see a rumor at the forum that he'd had a kid, but that seems to be pretty unsubstantiated...

Linda/enma_o



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Hello I'm Back!
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry I ve been absent but my computer has been offline since early yesterday morning. Also I would like to know if any of the members of the Shinsengumi have
messages.messageBody:
Sorry I've been absent but my computer has been offline since early
yesterday morning. Also I would like to know if any of the members of
the Shinsengumi have any descendants that are still alive today?
